attributes.action: We are sick and tired of the "Us and Them" culture at Westminster.
attributes.additional_details: Real Recall seems to have been rejected and forgotten by MP's and this must be exposed and a better way found to do the bidding of the voter.
attributes.background: The voter needs a failsafe way to express our disgust and frustration at the arrogant way Politicians treat their voters by lying, cheating, with corruption, and greed.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept your petition as it does not make clear what specific action you want the Government or Parliament to take. 

If you would like the Recall Act to be changed, you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105144

Or you could start your own petition calling for a specific change.
